original_title: ಶಿವಾಜಿ ಸುರತ್ಕಲ್ 2: Mysterious case of ಮಾಯಾವಿ
overview: A serial killer is on the loose and the onus is on Karnataka’s Sherlock Holmes, Shivaji Surathkal, to catch him. The case becomes complex just when Shivaji is about to solve it. Four murders, a ticking clock and no clues; can Shivaji stop the next murder and save the victim?
title: Shivaji Surathkal 2: Mysterious case of Maayavi
